frame.name: Exchange_currency
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Money_owner</fen> exchanges <fen>Sum_1</fen> in the <fen>Source_currency</fen> for <fen>Sum_2</fen> in the <fen>Target_currency</fen> at some <fen>Exchange_service</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Time">After checking into the Intourist-operated $30-a-day Hotel Zerafshon</fex>, <fex name="Money_owner">we</fex> each <t>exchanged</t> <fex name="sm1">$50</fex> <fex name="Target_currency">for Uzbek currency</fex> <fex name="exs">with a shifty loiterer</fex> <fex name="Place">in the lobby</fex> <fex name="exr">at the rate</fex> .</ex>
<ex><fex name="mon">We</fex> <fex name="tim">recently</fex> <t>exchanged</t> <fex name="sm1">$100</fex> <fex name="sm2">for Â£64.00 UK pounds</fex>.</ex>
<ex>If <fex name="mon">he</fex> <t>exchanged</t> <fex name="sm1">the money</fex> <fex name="tar">into Deutsch-marks</fex>, his 18 marks in Germany can just barely obtain four Big Macs.</ex>
<ex>He said the most crucial evidence was that of <fex name="mon">former police reservist, Simo Petersen-Jessen, now in Australia, who</fex> had <t>converted</t> <fex name="sm1">the money</fex> <fex name="tar">into rands</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Money_owner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person who exchanges <fen>Sum_1</fen> for <fen>Sum_2</fen>.
<ex> <fex name="mon">Kornfeldt</fex> hurried through customs, grabbed a city map at a tourist information desk, <t>changed</t> $40 USD into about 300 Hong Kong dollars before leaving the airport</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Sum_1
FE.definition:
<def-root>An amount of money in the <fen>Source_currency</fen> that the <fen>Money_owner</fen> exchanges for an amount in the <fen>Target_currency</fen>.
<ex>I said forget it and just <t>exchanged</t> <fex name="sm1">$40 US cash</fex> into $47 and change in Canadian. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Source_currency
FE.definition:
<def-root>The kind of currency of the <fen>Money_owner</fen> has before the exchange.
<ex>We stopped at a bank were we <t>exchanged</t> <fex name="src">Euros</fex> for Danish money.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Sum_2
FE.definition:
<def-root>The amount of money in the <fen>Target_currency</fen> that the <fen>Money_owner</fen> receives in exchange for <fen>Sum_1</fen>.
<ex>On the bus we <t>exchanged</t> $50 <fex name="sm2">for 1410 rubles</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Exchange_service
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual or institution which changes the <fen>Money_owner</fen>'s money into the <fen>Target_currency</fen>.
<ex>Bill <t>exchanged</t> $100 <fex name="exs">at a bank</fex>, before hitting the bike path for Krems.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Target_currency
FE.definition:
<def-root>The kind of currency that the <fen>Money_owner</fen> receives as part of the exchange.
<ex> We had <t>exchanged</t> $100 <fex name="tar">into francs</fex> in LAX to be able to pay for the cab ride upon arrival. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The location where the money is exchanged.
<ex>I <t>exchanged</t> $100 <fex name="pla">in Croatia</fex> because i needed a round trip bus ticket to sarajevo.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The time when the currency is exchanged.
<ex>We walked around Eyre Square and <t>exchanged</t> money <fex name="tim">before walking into Taaffes pub and grabbing my first draught pint of Guinness of the trip</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the exchange event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously), force (hard, softly), secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Money_owner</fen> that also affect the action (deliberately, eagerly, carefully).
<ex>He <fex name="man">carefully</fex> <t>exchanged</t> his dollars for roubles.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Exchange_rate
FE.definition:
<def-root>
<ex>I <t>exchanged</t> $100 in $20 bills <fex name="exr">at an exchange rate of 24.4 to 1</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The action of the <fen>Money_owner</fen> whereby the exchange is acheived.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The action that the <fen>Money_owner</fen> is attempting to accomplish with the exchange.</def-root>

FE.name: Money
FE.definition:
<def-root>Currency that is being exchanged by the <fen>Money_owner</fen>.
<ex> <fex name="Money_owner">I</fex> <t>exchanged</t> <fex name="Sum_1">$1000</fex> <fex name="Money">of my money</fex> <fex name="exs">at the bank</fex>. </ex>
</def-root>

lexUnit.name: exchange.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to have money in one currency replaced with money in another

lexUnit.name: change.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to exchange into another currency

lexUnit.name: convert.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: change (money, stocks, or units in which a quantity is expressed) into others of a different kind.
